content.text: Well, I just spent all day paddle boarding, and it was awesome. It's my new favorite hobby.
That's great! I've never done it before. What's the best part about it?
I love being out on the water, and it's a great workout. Plus, I love getting to show off my long fingernails.
Ha ha, that's a good point. I'm not very outdoorsy, so I don't think paddle boarding would be my thing, but I'm glad you enjoy it.
Yeah, it's definitely not for everyone. But I'm trying to find ways to combine my two loves: paddle boarding and makeup.
That's a fun idea. I'm sure you could come up with some cool looks.
Thanks! I think it'd be really fun to do a photo shoot while I'm paddle boarding.
That would be awesome! I'd love to see it if you ever do it.
I'll definitely post it on Instagram if I do.
Cool. I'll be on the lookout for it.
